about_the_game:
(This here is the Demo page for Ducking Grenades, for more information on the Story, as well as a list of currently planned features for the full version, please check out the main game page for Ducking Grenades!)

Ducking Grenades is an unconventional 2D side-scrolling action game in which grenades serve to traverse through the different levels, removing obstacles, defeating enemies that stand in your way and accomplish your goals!

Demo Content

  • Tutorial, first main level and first story instance playable in demo!
  • (See the main game page for Ducking Grenades for a list of currently planned features for the full version!)

Supported Resolutions For The Demo (Full game will support more)

(NOTE: When you launch the game for the first time, the game will automatically set the game to your device's resolution. If you experience issues with this resolution, navigate to Options -> Display and select one of the supported resolutions below)
  • 1920 x 1080 - 16:9,
  • 1920 x 1200 - 16:9,
  • 2560 x 1440 - 16:9,
  • 3440 x 1440 - 21:9,

Are you ready to experience a unique game, action packed gameplay and a lot of fun?! Then you are looking in the right place!

Use your grenades to traverse in the most epic way possible ...


... and to fight any enemies that dare oppose you!


Have fun playing the demo and stay tuned for the release of the full version by wish listing it and following me on my official channels!

name: Ducking Grenades Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9, supported up to 2560 x 1440 + 3440x1440, 21:9

short_description: A fast-paced 2D side-scrolling action game with pixel art! What happened to your arms and legs? Doesn't matter, simply blast your way through this world with grenades! Help our protagonist Ducky to hunt down the Evil General Goosey and his minions and bring peace to the universe!
